page.title: 15STREETS & BUILDINGS xiii.
page.content:
The Modern Developments.
Beyond the village centre lie the modern housing estates.Begun in the late 1950's these large estates were built of three and four bedroomed private houses.Many people moved into the village to these homes and commuted to their work places.Nowadays people commute to jobs as far away as London, travelling by rail from Wellingborough or Northampton.House prices of between 30-40,000 pounds make the Earls Barton estates attractive.However,houses with larger facilities are less easily available in the village and are very expensive when they do appear on the market.
